root: ^Oh! Apologies, Edrick, I wasn't aware ghosts could speak- nor be stowaways.
^I had to stay, I'm keeping you two from killing each other.
^Less a stowaway and more of a, backseat driver, but on the outside.

c-0: ^It's a desirable trait where I come from, I'm pointed and poised. I'll have you know I'm well liked by everyone except Jasper.
^Oh really? And who's left to judge?
c-1: ^Verbally yes, luckily for the sun-kisser behind us, Moonwalker healers are sworn to never raise their fist against a creature that breathes.
c-2: ^I'll have you know I'm immune to backseat driving of any kind - chariot or otherwise!
g-0: ^Now Edrick, while I'm glad you're here, we should focus. We don't have all the time in the world.
